name: AgritalkRadio
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The AgriTalk app offers live and archived broadcasts of the AgriTalk Radio Show and AgriTalk After the Bell. You’ll also find friends of AgriTalk like AgDay Television’s Clinton Griffiths, U.S. Farm Report’s Tyne Morgan and MILK Business Magazine’s Anna-Lisa Laca.

AgriTalk, hosted by Chip Flory, is agriculture’s daily national conversation. Catch it live on the app at 10:06 Central each weekday as Chip talks with national ag leaders and farmers alike about the issues impacting your farm and your community.

AgriTak After the Bell is the markets follow-up to AgriTalk. Each afternoon (live at 2:06 Central) Chip shares the news and analysis that shapes the markets and gets you set for the next day of trading.

Farm Sense, from AgDay’s Clinton Griffiths, is a weekly commentary on some of the biggest issues facing agriculture and rural America. From the farm economy to new ag technology, to rural healthcare, rural living and raising good kids, Farm Sense takes a common sense approach to tackling real-life problems.

Join U.S. Farm Report Host Tyne Morgan as she highlights some of the women making a difference in agriculture in No Man’s Land. Not only will she highlight the grit it takes to make the changes happen, but also help paint an accurate picture of not only the obstacles agriculture faces, but also the opportunity. It’s a podcast about women, empowering other women… to succeed in what’s historically been a male-dominated industry.



And The First Years by MILK Business’ Anna-Lisa Laca is a podcast about the unicorns of American Agriculture: first generation farmers, and the guts, grit, determination and business prowess required to be one.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
